CustomField.description: It stores a JSON file in which Rule and/or Mission Criteria, Criterion Group and Master-detail processing are displayed. It is completed when a Promotion or Challenge is enabled.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: It stores a JSON file in which Rule and/or Mission Criteria, Criterion Group and Master-detail processing are displayed. It is completed when a Promotion or Challenge is enabled.
CustomField.label: Criteria Fields
